question: Albers schonberg disease is also known as -
exp: Ans. is 'b' i.e., Osteopetrosis o Osteopetrosis is also known as Marble bone disease or Albers-Schonberg disease.o Paget's disease is known as Osteitis deformans,o Osteogenesis imperfecta is known as Brittle bone disease,o Osteoporosis is known as Fragile bone disease.
